name: A Rogue Pawn
description:
A Rogue Pawn is a prototype I made for my AI class in about 3 days, it was meant to show off procedural generation. The prototype uses a melding between BSP (Binary Space Partitioning) and Drunkard's Walk to allow for more/less natural dungeon formations.

Just download it, unzip it and you should be able to just start it right up.

Controls:

  • Start the game by pressing [Space] at the title screen.
  • Walk with [W, A, S, D]
  • Walk into the staircases to advance to new floors
  • Press [M] to toggle the overbearing map
  • Quit the game by pressing [Escape]
